original: Peṭakopadesa
analyzed: peṭaka upadesa

original: 4. Suttavicayacatutthabhūmi
Tattha katamo suttavicayo?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ sutta vicayo

original: Tattha kusalehi dhammehi akusalehi dhammehi pubbāparaso sādhukaṁ upaparikkhiyati.
analyzed: tattha kusalehi dhammehi akusalehi dhammehi pubba aparasaḥ sādhukam upaparikkhiyati

original: Kiṁ nu kho idaṁ suttaṁ ārabhi …pe… tehi suttehi saha adhisannaṭṭhehi yujjati udāhu na yujjatīti?
analyzed: kim nu kho idam suttam ārabhi pe tehi suttehi saha adhisanna ṭṭhehi yujjati udāhu na yujjati iti

original: Yathā bhagavā kilese ādimhi tattha deseti.
analyzed: yathā bhagavā kilese ādimhi tattha deseti

original: Kiṁ desitaṁ?
analyzed: kim

original: Tesaṁ kilesānaṁ pahānaṁ udāhu no desitanti upaparikkhitabbaṁ.
analyzed: tesam kilesānam pahānam udāhu no desitanti upaparikkhitabba

original: Yadi na desitaṁ bhagavati tesaṁ kilesānaṁ pahānaṁ kusalā dhammā pariyesitabbā;
analyzed: yadi na desitam bhagavati tesam kilesānam pahānam kusalāḥ dhammā pariyesitabbā

original: yattha te akusalā pahānaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: yattha te akusalā pahānam gacchanti

original: Sace samannehamāno na labhati.
analyzed: sace samannehamānaḥ na labhati

original: Tattha akusalā dhammā apakaḍḍhitabbā vīmaṁsitabbā, saṅkilesabhāgiyasuttaṁ, yadi kilesā apakaḍḍhiyantā.
analyzed: tattha akusalāḥ dhammāḥ apakaḍḍhitabbāḥ vīmasitabbā saṅkilesabhāgiya sutta yadi kilesāḥ apakaḍḍhiyantā

original: Ye vā na denti tattha upaparikkhitabbā ariyamaggadhammā tāsu bhūmīsu kilesā pahānaṁ gacchanti, udāhu na gacchantīti.
analyzed: ye vā na denti tattha upaparikkhitabbāḥ ariya magga dhammā tāsu bhūmīsu kilesāḥ pahānam gacchanti udāhu na gacchanti iti

original: Yattakā pana kilesā desitā.
analyzed: yattakā pana kilesāḥ desitā

original: Na tattakā ariyadhammā desitā.
analyzed: na tattakāḥ ariya dhammāḥ desitā

original: Yattha kilesā pahānaṁ gacchanti, tattha ye kilesā ariyadhammānaṁ paṭipakkhena na yujjanti, te apakaḍḍhitabbā, sace apakaḍḍhiyantā yojanaṁ deti.
analyzed: yattha kilesā pahānam gacchanti tattha ye kilesāḥ ariya dhammānam paṭipakkhena na yujjanti te apakaḍḍhitabbā sace apakaḍḍhiyantā yojanam deti

original: Tattha evaṁ vīmaṁsitabbaṁ.
analyzed: tattha evam

original: Dve tīṇi vā taduttari vā kilesā ekena ariyamaggena pahānaṁ gacchantīti.
analyzed: dve tīṇi vā tad uttari vā kilesāḥ ekena ariya maggena pahānam gacchanti iti

original: Sace evaṁ vīmaṁsiyantā yojanaṁ deti, tattha upaparikkhitabbaṁ.
analyzed: sace evam yojanam deti tattha upaparikkhitabba

original: Paramparāya vā piṭakasampadānena vā suttassa attho ca nattho ca.
analyzed: paramparāya vā piṭaka sampadānena vā suttassa attho ca nattho ca

original: Yaṁ vā na sakkā suttaṁ niddisituṁ neva suttaṁ vicikicchitabbaṁ.
analyzed: yam vā na sakkā suttam niddisitum na iva suttam

original: Evaṁ yathā ādimhi kusalā dhammā honti.
analyzed: evam yathā ādimhi kusalāḥ dhammāḥ honti

original: Ye kilesā te pahīneyyāti.
analyzed: ye kilesā te pahīneyya ati

original: Te upaparikkhitabbā.
analyzed: te upaparikkhitabbā

original: Puro vā kusalo paṭipakkhena vā puro desanā, anūnā anadhikā uggahetabbā.
analyzed: puras vā kusalaḥ paṭipakkhena vā puras desanā anūnā anadhikā uggahetabbā

original: Yathā paṭhamo uttilo yesamidāni kilesānaṁ ye ariyadhammā desitā ime kilesā imehi ariyadhammehi pahīyanti, udāhu nappahīyantīti vicinitabbā.
analyzed: yathā paṭhamaḥ uttilaḥ yesam idāni kilesānam ye ariya dhammāḥ desitāḥ ime kilesāḥ imehi ariya dhammehi pahīyanti udāhu na pahīyanti iti vicinitabbā

original: Yadi upaparikkhiyamānā yujjanti, gahetabbā.
analyzed: yadi upaparikkhiyamānā yujjanti gahetabbā

original: Atha na yujjanti, ye kilesā apaṭipakkhā honti, te kilesā aparipakkhitabbā.
analyzed: atha na yujjanti ye kilesāḥ apaṭipakkhāḥ honti te kilesāḥ a paripakkhitabbā

original: Ye ca ariyadhammā paṭipakkhā honti, te ariyadhammā apakaḍḍhitabbā.
analyzed: ye ca ariya dhammā paṭipakkhāḥ honti te ariya dhammā apakaḍḍhitabbā

original: Na hi ariyadhammā anāgāmikilesappahānaṁ gacchanti, nāpi ariyadhammā sabbakilesānaṁ pahānāya saṁvattanti.
analyzed: na hi ariya dhammā anāgāmi kilesa ppahānam gacchanti na api ariya dhammā sabba kilesānam pahānāya savattanti

original: Yathā kusalā mettā akusalo rāgo na tu kusalā mettāti kāretvā akusalassa rāgassa pahānāya sambhavati byāpādo mettāya pahānaṁ gacchati.
analyzed: yathā kusalā mettā akusalaḥ rāgaḥ na tu kusalā mettā ati kāretvā akusalassa rāgassa pahānāya sambhavati byāpādaḥ mettāya pahānam gacchati

original: Tasmā ubho kilesā upaparikkhitabbā.
analyzed: tasmai ubho kilesā upaparikkhitabbā

original: Yo yo ca dhammo upadisiyati kusalo vā akusalo vā so apakaḍḍhitabbo.
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ ca dhammaḥ upadisiyati kusalaḥ vā akusalaḥ vā saḥ apakaḍḍhitabbo

original: Sace te yujjanti apakaḍḍhiyamāno natthi upaparikkhitabbaṁ.
analyzed: sace te yujjanti apakaḍḍhiyamāno natthi

original: Dve vā kilesā ekena ariyadhammena pahīneyyāti dvīhi vā ariyadhammehi eko vā kileso pahīyatīti.
analyzed: dve vā kilesā ekena ariya dhammena pahīneyyāti dvīhi vā ariya dhammehi ekaḥ vā kileso pahīyati iti

original: Atha vā evampi upaparikkhiyamānaṁ yujjati, tattha vīmaṁsitabbaṁ vā yathā yujjati tattha vīmaṁsitabbaṁ vā, yathā nanu sakkā suttaṁ niddisituṁ, na hi sutte vicikicchitabbaṁ.
analyzed: atha vā evam pi upaparikkhiyamānam yujjati tattha vīmasitabbam vā yathā yujjati tattha vīmasitabbam vā yathā nanu sakkā suttam niddisitu na hi sutte vicikicchitabba

original: Kileso maṁ ariyadhammesu desitesu ubhayato upaparikkhitabbaṁ.
analyzed: kilesaḥ mam ariya dhammesu desitesu ubhayatas

original: Kira ye vā ime kilesā desitā ye ca ariyadhammā desitā gāthāya vā byākaraṇena vā, kiṁ nu kho ime kilesā imehi ariyadhammehi pahīyanti, udāhu nappahīyanti?
analyzed: kira ye vā ime kilesāḥ desitāḥ ye ca ariya dhammāḥ desitāḥ gāthāya vā byākaraṇena vā kim nu kho ime kilesāḥ imehi ariya dhammehi pahīyanti udāhu na pahīyanti

original: Ime vā ariyadhammā imesaṁ kilesānaṁ pahānāya saṁvattantīti.
analyzed: ime vai ariya dhammā imesam kilesānam pahānāya savattanti iti

original: Kiñcāpi kusalehi dhammehi akusalā dhammā pahānaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: kiñca api kusalehi dhammehi akusalāḥ dhammāḥ pahānam gacchanti

original: Na tu sabbehi ariyadhammehi sabbākusalā pahānaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: na tu sabbehi ariya dhammehi sabba akusalāḥ pahānam gacchanti

original: Yathā mettā kusalo akusalo ca rāgo na tu kusalā mettā akusalo rāgoti kāretvā mettāya rāgo pahānaṁ, byāpādo mettāya pahānaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: yathā mettā kusalaḥ akusalaḥ ca rāgaḥ na tu kusalāḥ mettā akusalaḥ rāgaḥ iti kāretvā mettāya byāpādaḥ mettāya pahānam gacchanti

original: Evaṁ kilesoti kāretvā suttena pahānaṁ gacchati.
analyzed: evam kileso ti kāretvā suttena pahānam gacchati

original: Na sutto dhammoti kāretvā sabbaṁ kilesassa pahānāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: na suttaḥ dhammaḥ ti kāretvā sabbam kilesassa pahānāya savattati

original: Yaṁ tu suttassa ariyadhammo saṅkilesapaṭipakkho, so tena pahānaṁ gacchatīti.
analyzed: yam tu suttassa ariya dhammo saṅkilesa paṭipakkho so tena pahānam gacchati iti

original: Tattha kusale desite sutte byākaraṇe vā saṅkilesā na yujjanti ariyadhammā vā, te mahāpadese niddisitabbāvayavena apakaḍḍhitabbā.
analyzed: tattha kusale desite sutte byākaraṇe vā saṅkilesāḥ na yujjanti ariya dhammāḥ vā te mahā apadese niddisitabba avayavena apakaḍḍhitabbā

original: Tattha kilesehi ca desitehi ariyadhammesu ca yadipi tena ariyadhammena te kilesā pahānaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: tattha kilesehi ca desitehi ariya dhammesu ca yadi pi tena ariya dhammena te kilesāḥ pahānam gacchanti

original: Tatthapi uttari upaparikkhitabbaṁ.
analyzed: tattha api uttari

original: Kena kāraṇena ete kilesā pajahitabbā, kena kāraṇena ariyadhammā desitāti?
analyzed: kena kāraṇena ete kilesā pajahitabbā kena kāraṇena ariya dhammā desitā ati

original: Yena yena vā ākārena ariyadhammā desitā, tena tena pakārena ayaṁ kileso ṭhito.
analyzed: yena yena vā ākārena ariya dhammā desitā tena tena pakārena ayam kileso ṭhitaḥ

original: Atthi hi eko kileso, tena vā ariyadhammā na aññathā aññathā pahātabbo, yathā diṭṭhi rāgo avijjā ca dassanena pahātabbā.
analyzed: atthi hi ekaḥ kilesaḥ tena vā ariya dhammāḥ na aññathā aññathā pahātabbo yathā diṭṭhi rāgaḥ avijjā ca dassanena pahātabbā

original: Sā ce evañca avijjā bhāvanāya bhūmi vā dhammā bhāvanāya pahātabbā.
analyzed: sā ce evañca avijjā bhāvanāya bhūmi vā dhammā bhāvanāya pahātabbā

original: Sāyeva uddhambhāgiyaṁ asaṅkhatadassanāya vimuttiyā animittena cetosamādhinā amanasikārena pahīyati.
analyzed: sāya iva uddhambhāgiyam asaṅkhata dassanāya vimuttiyāḥ animittena cetosamādhinā amanasikārena pahīyati

original: Evaṁ sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ upaparikkhitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam sa attham sa byañjanam

original: Ye dassanena pahātabbā kilesā dassanākārena ariyadhammo desito, bhāvanāya pahātabbā
analyzed: ye dassanena pahātabbā kilesā dassana ākārena ariya dhammo desito bhāvanāya pahātabbā

original: bhāvanākārena ariyadhammo desito, patisevanā pahātabbā patisevanākārena ariyadhammo
analyzed: bhāvanā ākārena ariya dhammo desito patisevanā pahātabbā patisevanā ākārena ariya dhammo

original: desito, evaṁ vinodanapahātabbā yāva satta āsavā kātabbā, yāvaññathā.
analyzed: evam vinodana pahātabbā yāva satta āsavā kātabbā yāvaññathā

original: Aññathā hesa dhammo pahātabbo aññenākārena ariyadhammo desito, so ariyadhammo aññathā pariyesitabbo.
analyzed: aññathā ha isa dhammo pahātabbo aññena ākārena ariya dhammo desito so ariya dhammo aññathā pariyesitabbo

original: Yadi ayaṁ dhammo pariyesato yo ca deseti yena yenākārena, so ariyadhammo pariyesitabbo, tenākārena kileso pahīyati.
analyzed: yadi ayam dhammo pariyesataḥ yaḥ ca deseti yena yena ākārena so ariya dhammo pariyesitabbo tena ākārena kileso pahīyati

original: So tattha upaparikkhitabbo.
analyzed: saḥ tattha upaparikkhitabbaḥ

original: Atha na yujjati yadi hi tena suttena vihitaṁ suttaṁ vīmaṁsitabbaṁ.
analyzed: atha na yujjati yadi hi tena suttena vihitam suttam

original: Yathā yujjati, tathā gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: yathā yujjati tathā

original: Yathā na yujjati, tathā na gahetabbaṁ, addhā etaṁ bhagavatā na bhāsitaṁ, āyasmatā
analyzed: yathā na yujjati tathā na addhā etam bhagavatā na bhāsitaḥ āyasmatā

original: vā duggahitaṁ, yathā mahāpadese niddisitabbaṁ, bhagavatā yathābhūtaṁ desitaṁ, yo
analyzed: vā mahā apadese bhagavatā yathābhūtam desita

original: ca dhammo desito kusalo ca akusalo ca tassa dhammassa paccayo pariyesitabbo.
analyzed: ca dhammo desito kusalo ca akusalo ca tassa dhammassa paccayo pariyesitabbo

original: Na hi paccayā vinā dhammo appaccayo uppajjati.
analyzed: na hi paccayāḥ vinā dhammaḥ appaccayaḥ uppajjati

original: Tattha ko ākāro pariyesanāya?
analyzed: tattha kaḥ ākāro pariyesanāya

original: Tattha tathārūpaṁ sahetu sappaccayaṁ soyaṁ dhammo vuttoti idaṁ vīmaṁsitabbaṁ.
analyzed: tattha tathārūpam sa hetu sappaccayam saḥ ayam dhammo vuttaḥ ti idam

original: So ca paccayo tividho—
analyzed: so ca paccayaḥ tividhaḥ

original: mudu majjho adhimatto.
analyzed: mudu majjhaḥ adhimattaḥ

original: Tattha mudumhi paccaye mududhammo gahetabbo, evaṁ satyesa paccayo duvidho paramparāpaccayo ca samanantarapaccayo ca.
analyzed: tattha mudumhi paccaye mudu dhammo gahetabbo evam sati esa paccayaḥ duvidho paramparā paccayo ca samanantara paccayo ca

original: So paccayo mudutena byādhimattaṁ pariyesitabbaṁ.
analyzed: so paccayaḥ mudu tena byādhimattam

original: Kiṅkāraṇaṁ?
analyzed: kiṅkāraṇa

original: Aññataropi paccayo aññehi paccayehi pariyattiṁ vā pāripūriṁ vā gacchati.
analyzed: aññataraḥ api paccayaḥ aññehi paccayehi pariyattim vā pāripūrim vā gacchati

original: Tattha yo dhammo desito, tassa dhammassa etena vā kāraṇena vā hetu pariyesitabbo.
analyzed: tattha yaḥ dhammaḥ desito tassa dhammassa etena vā kāraṇena vā hetu pariyesitabbo

original: Yathā paccayo hetunā paccayena ca, so tassa dhammassa nissando pariyesitabbo.
analyzed: yathā paccayaḥ hetunā paccayena ca so tassa dhammassa nissandaḥ pariyesitabbo

original: Yathā niddiṭṭho adhiṭṭhāne padhānaṁ pariyesati, so paccayo pariyesitabbo.
analyzed: yathā niddiṭṭhaḥ adhiṭṭhāne padhānam pariyesati so paccayaḥ pariyesitabbo

original: Na hi mudussa dhammassa adhimatto nissando adhimattassa vā nissandassa mududhammo,
analyzed: na hi mudussa dhammassa adhimattaḥ nissandaḥ adhimattassa vā nissandassa mudu dhammo

original: atha mudussa mudu majjhāya majjho adhimattassa adhimatto yujjati, taṁ gahetabbaṁ,
analyzed: atha mudussa mudu majjhāya majjhaḥ adhimattassa adhimattaḥ yujjati tam

original: atha na yujjati na gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: atha na yujjati na gahetabba

original: Yañca bhagavā ārabhati dhammaṁ desetuṁ, taṁyeva dhammaṁ majjhantapariyosānaṁ deseti, yathā suttādhiṭṭhāne dhammā ādimhi niddisati, taṁyeva bahu tassa suttassa pariyosānaṁ.
analyzed: yat ca bhagavā ārabhati dhammam desetu tayā iva dhammam majjhanta pariyosānam deseti yathā sutta adhiṭṭhāne dhammā ādimhi niddisati tayā iva bahu tassa suttassa pariyosāna

original: Tassa hi dhammassa vasena taṁ suttaṁ hoti gāthā vā byākaraṇaṁ khuddakaṁ mahantaṁ vā, yathā pana duvidhā anurūpanti vā thapanā ca desanāthapanā.
analyzed: tassa hi dhammassa vasena tam suttam hoti gāthā vā byākaraṇam khuddakam mahantam vā yathā pana duvidhāḥ vā thapanā ca desanā thapanā

original: Rūpantipi dhammassa pariyesitabbā.
analyzed: rūpam ti pi dhammassa pariyesitabbā

original: Yathā ca bhagavatā pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ saṁvaraṇaṁ desitaṁ taṇhāya niggahaṇatthaṁ icchāva hoti.
analyzed: yathā ca bhagavatā pañcannam indriyānam savaraṇam desitam taṇhāya niggahaṇa attham icchāva hoti

original: Deseti yathā gopālakopame sutte aññehipi suttehi bhagavā bhāsati icchāva hoti majjhimanikāye
analyzed: deseti yathā gopālaka upame sutte aññehi pi suttehi bhagavā bhāsati icchāva hoti majjhima nikāye

original: vitakko ayaṁ bhagavato desanānurūpanti iti so dhammo aññesupi veyyākaraṇesu pariyesitabbo.
analyzed: vitakkaḥ ayam bhagavataḥ desanā anurūpan ti iti so dhammo aññesu pi veyyākaraṇesu pariyesitabbaḥ

original: Na hi ekaṁ hi sutte daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: na hi ekam hi sutte daṭṭhabbo

original: Yujjanaṁ taṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: yuj janam tam

original: Tattha katamaṁ anuññātaṁ?
analyzed: tattha kataman

original: Yaṁ kiñci suttaṁ bhagavatā na bhāsitaṁ tañca suttesuyeva dissati, evametaṁ dhāretabbaṁ.
analyzed: yat kiñci suttam bhagavatā na bhāsitam tat ca suttesu yeva dissati evam etat

original: Yathā asukena bhāsitanti, taṁ suttaṁ vīmaṁsitabbaṁ.
analyzed: yathā asukena bhāsitanti tam suttam

original: Kiṁ nu kho imaṁ suttaṁ anuññātaṁ khamaṁ bhagavato udāhu nānuññātaṁ khamaṁ, kiñci rūpañca suttaṁ bhagavato anuññātaṁ khamaṁ kiñci rūpañca nānuññātaṁ khamaṁ?
analyzed: kim nu kho imam suttam anuññātam khamam bhagavataḥ udāhu na anuññātam khama kiñci rūpam ca suttam bhagavataḥ anuññātam khamam kiñci rūpam ca na anuññātam khama

original: Yaṁ sabbaso anotāretvā dasabalo gocaraṁ deseti, taṁ sabbaṁ suttaṁ bhagavato nānuññātaṁ khamaṁ.
analyzed: yam sabbasas anotāretvā dasabalaḥ gocaram deseti tam sabbam suttam bhagavataḥ na anuññātam khama

original: Atthipi so sāvako dasabalānaṁ gocaraṁ jānāti odhiso anodhiso, taṁ pana balaṁ sabbaso
analyzed: atthi pi so sāvakaḥ dasa balānam gocaram jānāti odhisaḥ anodhisaḥ tam pana balam sabbaso

original: na jānāti aññathā nāma savanena, yathā āyasmatā sāriputtena yena brāhmaṇo ovadito,
analyzed: na jānāti aññathā nāma savanena yathā āyasmatā sāriputtena yena brāhmaṇaḥ ovadito

original: tassa āyasmato natthi indriyabalavemattañāṇaṁ, tena puggalaparo parañca taṁ ajānanto
analyzed: tassa āyasmataḥ natthi tena puggala paraḥ param ca tam a jānanto

original: sati uttarikaraṇīye uppādito, so bhagavatā apasādito.
analyzed: sati uttarikaraṇīye uppāditaḥ saḥ bhagavatā apasāditaḥ

original: Yathāva āyasmā mahākassapo bhāgineyyaṁ ovadati anantariyasamannāgato iddhipāṭihīrena
analyzed: yathāva āyasmā mahākassapaḥ bhāgineyyam ovadati anantariya samannāgataḥ iddhi pāṭihīrena

original: aṅguliyo adīpetvā yaṁ sabbesaṁ dhammānaṁ kammasamādānānaṁ hetuso ṭhānaso yathābhūtaṁ
analyzed: aṅguliyaḥ a dīpetvā yam sabbesam dhammānam kamma samādānānam hetusaḥ ṭhānasaḥ yathābhūta

original: ñāṇaṁ, tassa āyasmato saṁvijjate, tena naṁ ovadati, taṁ bhagavā karoti.
analyzed: tassa āyasmataḥ savijjate tena nam ovadati tam bhagavā karoti

original: “Sacepi dasa pajjote,
analyzed: saced ipi dasa pajjote

original: dhārayissasi kassapa;
analyzed: dhārayissasi kassapa

original: Neva dakkhati rūpāni,
analyzed: na iva dakkhati rūpāni

original: cakkhu tassa na vijjatī”ti.
analyzed: cakkhu tassa na vijjati iti

original: Api ca kho yathā dūto rājavacanena sattamanusāsati, evaṁ sesānugo aññātakaṁ ghosaṁ paresaṁ deseti.
analyzed: api ca kho yathā dūtaḥ rāja vacanena sattam anusāsati evam sesa anugaḥ aññātakam ghosam paresam deseti

original: Anuññātakhamasuttaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: anuññāta khama suttam

original: Ananuññātakhamaṁ na gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: an anuññāta khamam na

original: Tattha katamo suttasaṅkaro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ sutta saṅkaro

original: Pañcavidhaṁ suttaṁ, saṅkilesabhāgiyaṁ vāsanābhāgiyaṁ dassanabhāgiyaṁ bhāvanābhāgiyaṁ asekkhabhāgiyaṁ.
analyzed: pañcavidham sutta saṅkilesa bhāgiyam vāsanā bhāgiyam dassana bhāgiyam bhāvanā bhāgiyam asekkha bhāgiya

original: Aññaṁ ārādheyya aññaṁ deseti aññassa ca suttassa atthaṁ aññamhi sutte niddisati.
analyzed: aññam ārādheyya aññam deseti aññassa ca suttassa attham aññamhi sutte niddisati

original: Suttassa vā hi anekākāraṁ atthaṁ niddisati.
analyzed: suttassa vā hi aneka ākāram attham niddisati

original: Ariyadhammasādhane atthaṁ vivarati.
analyzed: ariya dhamma sādhane attham vivarati

original: Vāsanābhāgiyassa atthaṁ dassanabhāgiyesu niddisati.
analyzed: vāsanābhāgiyassa attham dassanabhāgiyesu niddisati

original: Orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ atthaṁ uddhambhāgiyesu niddisati.
analyzed: orambhāgiyānam sayojanānam attham uddhambhāgiyesu niddisati

original: Mudumajjhānaṁ indriyānaṁ adhimattesu suttesu niddisati.
analyzed: indriyānam adhimattesu suttesu niddisati

original: Iti ayaṁ suttaṁ sambhedaṁ hetunā ca nissandena ca phalena ca niddesena ca mudumajjhādhimattatāyapi ca atthena ca byañjanena ca yo sambhedo, ayaṁ vuccati suttasaṅkaro.
analyzed: iti ayam suttam sambhedam hetunā ca nissandena ca phalena ca niddesena ca ca atthena ca byañjanena ca yaḥ sambhedaḥ ayam vuccati sutta saṅkaro

original: Yo asambhedo, ayaṁ vuccati suttavicayo.
analyzed: yaḥ asambhedaḥ ayam vuccati sutta vicayo

original: Tatthāyaṁ uddānagāthā
analyzed: tattha ayam uddāna gāthā

original: Purimānaṁ akkhaṇḍaṁ,
analyzed: purimānam

original: yathābhūtassa paccayo;
analyzed: yathābhūtassa paccayaḥ

original: Nissando vāsanāsaddhi,
analyzed: nissandaḥ vāsanā saddhi

original: anuññā suttasaṅkaro.
analyzed: anuññā sutta saṅkaro

original: Therassa mahākaccāyanassa suttavicayo nāma catutthabhūmi.
analyzed: therassa mahākaccāyanassa suttavicayaḥ nāma catuttha bhūmi
